00019 /** \file
00020  \brief Generate error codes
00021 */
00022 
00023 #include <stdlib.h>
00024 #include <stdio.h>
00025 
00026 #include "datasource.h"
00027 
00028 const char *error_simgen_name() {
00029     return "Error";
00030 }
00031 
00032 const char *error_simgen_longdesc() {
00033     return "Generate MIL errors\n"
00034         "Seed: Ignored";
00035 }
00036 
00037 int error_simgen_create(void **gen, const char *seed) {
00038     return 0;
00039 }
00040 
00041 void error_simgen_destroy(void *gen) {
00042 }
00043 
00044 int error_simgen_getvalue(void *gen, unsigned int mode, unsigned int PID, unsigned int *A, unsigned int *B, unsigned int *C, unsigned int *D) {
00045     if(0x00 == PID) {
00046         *A = 0x80; // 0101 => "Tell me about errors"
00047         *B = 0x00;
00048         *C = 0x00;
00049         *D = 0x00;
00050         return 4;
00051     }
00052 
00053     if(0x01 == PID) {
00054         *A = 0x83; // 0x80 [mil set] bitwise OR 0x03 [three errors]
00055         *B = 0x00;
00056         *C = 0x00;
00057         *D = 0x00;
00058         return 4;
00059     }
00060     return 0;
00061 }
00062 
00063 int error_simgen_geterrorcodes(void *gen, unsigned int *errorcodes, int num_codes, int *mil) {
00064     int ret_codes = 3;
00065     switch(num_codes) {
00066         default:
00067             if(num_codes >= 3) {
00068                 errorcodes[4] = 0x41; // C0123
00069                 errorcodes[5] = 0x23;
00070             }
00071         case 2:
00072             if(num_codes >= 2) {
00073                 errorcodes[2] = 0x80; // B0003
00074                 errorcodes[3] = 0x03;
00075             }
00076         case 1:
00077             if(num_codes >= 1) {
00078                 errorcodes[0] = 0x01; // P0104
00079                 errorcodes[1] = 0x04;
00080             }
00081     }
00082     *mil=1;
00083     return ret_codes;
00084 }
00085 
00086 int error_simgen_clearerrorcodes(void *gen) {
00087     return 0;
00088 }
00089 
00090 // Declare our obdsim_generator. This is pulled in as an extern in obdsim.c
00091 struct obdsim_generator obdsimgen_error = {
00092     error_simgen_name,
00093     error_simgen_longdesc,
00094     error_simgen_create,
00095     error_simgen_destroy,
00096     error_simgen_getvalue,
00097     NULL,
00098     error_simgen_geterrorcodes,
00099     error_simgen_clearerrorcodes
00100 };
